about_the_game:
Everyone knows the main characters, but we can`t ever forget about the supporting subspecies! They are a must-have monster character class for your RPG game!

These new evolved versions of Studio Tokiwa's Classic Monsters Pack No.1 are back with a new and updated look. The Goblin now has kick-butt magic with his new staff and the Undead has a hot new fashion! Even the less significant ones will stand out with little a bit of change.

Enjoy flawless graphic images in your game by combining these monster graphics with other TOKIWA GRAPHICS series.

FEATURES:

* 4 monster battlers: Goblin Shaman, Cursed Undead, Evil Dragon, Red Beetle in 4 color variations; day / sunset / night / rain. Total of 16 battler graphics.
* Each character comes with walking sprites in 2 variations (normal and dark shadow). Total of 8 sprites.
*This pack is for RPG Maker use only!
